The Panchayat Raj is a three-tier system: The Zila Parishad undertakes repairs of school building in the villages.
Fifty percent of the total number of seats in Panchayats is reserved for women.
The Gram Sabha consists of all men and women in a village who are 18 years of age and above.
The Nyaya Panchayat is elected by the Block Samiti.
Members of the Block samiti elect the sarpanch.
Members of the Block Samiti elect the Panchayat Secretary.
Members of the Block Samiti elect their Pramukh.
Members of the Block Samiti elect their Block Development Office.
